trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" />.
The provider works in a similar fashion to the Microsoft .NET Framework standard licensing model.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider> offers <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> methods.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method determines whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A> retrieved by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> method is valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> metodo determina se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A> recuperati tramite il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> metodo è valido.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from this class, you can override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method to provide your own validation logic.
trans-unit.target: Quando si eredita da questa classe, è possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> metodo per fornire la propria logica di convalida.

trans-unit.source: This class exists to provide similar licensing functionality to COM licensing and uses text license files.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe esiste per fornire funzionalità di gestione delle licenze simili alle licenze COM e utilizza i file di licenza di testo.

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle licenze, vedere [come: licenza componenti e controlli](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a licensed control using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea un controllo concesso in licenza tramite il <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: It uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider> for the license manager.
trans-unit.target: Usa <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider> per la gestione delle licenze.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider" /> class.
The object type to return the key.
Returns a key for the specified type.
A confirmation that the <paramref name="type" /> parameter is licensed.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext" /> that specifies where you can use the licensed object.
A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the component requesting the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.License" />.
An object that requests the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.License" />.
<see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException" /> should be thrown when a component cannot be granted a license; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns a license for the instance of the component, if one is available.
A valid <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.License" />.
If this method cannot find a valid <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.License" /> or a valid <paramref name="context" /> parameter, it returns <see langword="null" />.

At design time, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> method looks for a license file named `myClassName.LIC`, where `myClassName` is the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> of the component to create.
trans-unit.target: In fase di progettazione di <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> metodo cerca un file di licenza denominato `myClassName.LIC`, dove `myClassName` è il <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> del componente da creare.

trans-unit.source: This file must be in the same directory as the .dll file that contains the component.
trans-unit.target: Questo file deve essere nella stessa directory del file DLL che contiene il componente.

trans-unit.source: Next, this method checks the first line of the license file against a key specified in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, questo metodo verifica la prima riga del file di licenza con una chiave specificata nel <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: If the key is valid, this line is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se la chiave è valida, la riga viene utilizzata come il <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey" /> to check.
A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the component requesting the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.License" />.

Determines whether the key that the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method retrieves is valid for the specified type.
<see langword="true" /> if the key is a valid <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey" /> for the specified type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method checks the key against the phrase: " `myClassName is a licensed component.` ", where `myClassName` is the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> of the component you want to create.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo verifica la chiave in base alla frase: " `myClassName is a licensed component.` ", dove `myClassName` è il <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> del componente di cui si desidera creare.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from this class, you can override this method to provide your own validation logic.
trans-unit.target: Quando si eredita da questa classe, è possibile eseguire l'override di questo metodo per fornire la propria logica di convalida.
